import React from "react"; const ProductCard = ({ _id, name, desc, images, categoryName, brand, ratings, price, discount, badge, inStock = false, }) => { return (

Out Of Stock

{badge != "" && (
{badge}
)}
{name}

{desc}

Price

₹ {price}₹ {(price - price * (discount / 100)).toFixed(0)}

); }; export default ProductCard;
